text:
I know the developers of sprocket rocket have tried to get HubSpot to stop this happening too!
It’s fantastic they update it so often, but they don’t want to spam literally all the partners all the time with it!
Yep, we've literally consider not updating it so often and just push once a month or something. But I'd rather get fixes/feature out to our users asap. :shrug::skin-tone-2:
